bibl.title: An Sappho sacerdos Artemidis fuerit? (sive de epitheto ἰόκολπος Sapphico dissertationes quaedam).
bibl.note: The epithet ἰόκολπος is attested not only in Sappho (frgg. 21, 13; 30, 5; 103, 6; 7; 17 V.; P. Oxy. XV, 1787 [= M.-P.3 1449; LDAB 3899] and P. Colon. Inv. 21351 + 21376 [= M.-P.3 1449.01; LDAB 10253]), but also in an Athenian inscription on an altar of Artemis Agrotera (I.G. II/III2, 4573). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Timothey Myakin, An Sappho sacerdos Artemidis fuerit? (sive de epitheto ἰόκολπος Sapphico dissertationes quaedam).

The epithet ἰόκολπος is attested not only in Sappho (frgg. 21, 13; 30, 5; 103, 6; 7; 17 V.; P. Oxy. XV, 1787 [= M.-P.3 1449; LDAB 3899] and P. Colon. Inv. 21351 + 21376 [= M.-P.3 1449.01; LDAB 10253]), but also in an Athenian inscription on an altar of Artemis Agrotera (I.G. II/III2, 4573). - Avec résumé en anglais.
